definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
lit. pull down the east wall to repair the west wall (idiom); fig. temporary expedient/rob Peter to pay Paul
pinyin: chai1 dong1 qiang2 bu3 xi1 qiang2

sentences.english: This is just like robbing Peter to pay Paul.
sentences.chinese: 這根本是挖東牆補西牆嘛。

sentences.english: All that remains of this building is the " Western Wall, " also known as the "Wailing Wall.
sentences.chinese: 存留至今的聖殿遺蹟只有其西牆，即著名的“哭牆”。

sentences.english: Last week we called this a Congressional comb-over.
sentences.chinese: 上週我們曾戲稱國會此舉無異於拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: You're merely robbing Peter to pay Paul.
sentences.chinese: 你只是在拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: I call this robbing Peter to pay Paul.
sentences.chinese: 我把這個叫做拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: Their efforts are in vain, for they're only robbing Peter to pay Paul.
sentences.chinese: 他們的努力全白費，因爲只是拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: It' nothing but robbing Peter to pay Paul that you want to borrow money from me to pay the loan back to the bank.
sentences.chinese: 你跟我借錢去還銀行的貸款，這無異於拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: Taking money from your company would be like taking from Peter to pay Paul.
sentences.chinese: 從你的公司拿錢是拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: Learing the knowledge of other classes in this one is robbing peter to play paul.
sentences.chinese: 要在這節課裏補那節課的內容是拆東牆補西牆。

sentences.english: Western Wall Plaza, Old City, Jerusalem, Israel.
sentences.chinese: 西牆廣場，舊城，耶路撒冷，以色列。

definition: Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
